Yellowstone Basin

Yellowstone Basin Ranch is a wildlife-rich, recreational paradise set on 294 deeded acres nested in the National Forest west of Yellowstone National Park

Learn More

Your own private Yellowstone

Less than 10 minutes by car from Yellowstone National Park and contiguous to the Park via the adjacent two million-acre Custer-Gallatin National Forest, Yellowstone Basin Ranch is your own private Yellowstone. The ranch enjoys wolves, bison, grizzly and black bears, elk, moose, antelope, deer, osprey, bald and golden eagles, waterfowl and upland birds on site. It is uniquely situated on a heavily trafficked wildlife corridor providing connectivity between Yellowstone Park and the Madison River Valley. With access to over one mile of the South Fork of the Madison River, four miles of creeks and eight acres of ponds, the ranch is a wildlife rich recreational paradise. Yellowstone Basin is also a great jumping off point to fishing on the Madison, Gallatin, Yellowstone, Firehole and other nearby rivers.


This beautiful property is currently for sale. If you are interested in learning more, please contact us.
